column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Gabrielle - Thank you for your review and feedback. I'm sorry you did not enjoy your to-go order. Ideally
column2: ramen is served for dine-in only; in fact
column3: in Japan there are many ramen restaurants that do not consider takeout an option. However
column5: we try to meet the demands of all of our guests in this regard.
